bpsection.text: The <uicontrol>Empty Recycle Bin</uicontrol> button purges (permanently deletes) all items. To purge a specific type of item, go to the tab for the item type.

choices: To restore a single page, hover over the page to restore, and click/tap the Restore icon for that item.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Pages-Restore-icon-E91.png|Restore icon for each item in the list.
To restore multiple pages, check the boxes for the items to restore, and click/tap the Restore button.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Pages-Select-Then-Restore-button-E91.png|Restore button.
To restore a single module, hover over the module to restore, and click/tap the Restore icon for that item.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Modules-Restore-icon-E91.png|Restore icon for each item in the list.
To restore multiple modules, check the boxes for the items to restore, and click/tap the Restore button.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Modules-Select-Then-Restore-button-E91.png|Restore button.
To restore a single user, hover over the user to restore, and click/tap the Restore icon for that item.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Users-Restore-icon-E91.png|Restore icon for each item in the list.
To restore multiple users, check the boxes for the items to restore, and click/tap the Restore button.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Users-Select-Then-Restore-button-E91.png|Restore button.
To restore a single template, hover over the template to restore, and click/tap the Restore icon for that item.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Templates-Restore-icon-E91.png|Restore icon for each item in the list.
To restore multiple templates, check the boxes for the items to restore, and click/tap the Restore button.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Templates-Select-Then-Restore-button-E91.png|Restore button.

bpsteps.cmd: Purge (Permanently delete) one or more pages.
choices: To purge a single page, hover over the page to purge, and click/tap the Delete icon for that item.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Pages-Delete-icon-E91.png|Delete icon for each item in the list.
To purge multiple pages, check the boxes for the items to purge, and click/tap the Delete button.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Pages-Select-Then-Delete-button-E91.png|Delete button.

bpsteps.cmd: Purge (Permanently delete) one or more modules.
choices: To purge a single module, hover over the module to purge, and click/tap the Delete icon for that item.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Modules-Delete-icon-E91.png|Delete icon for each item in the list.
To purge multiple modules, check the boxes for the items to purge, and click/tap the Delete button.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Modules-Select-Then-Delete-button-E91.png|Delete button.

bpsteps.cmd: Purge (Permanently delete) one or more users.
choices: To purge a single user, hover over the user to purge, and click/tap the Delete icon for that item.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Users-Delete-icon-E91.png|Delete icon for each item in the list.
To purge multiple users, check the boxes for the items to purge, and click/tap the Delete button.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Users-Select-Then-Delete-button-E91.png|Delete button.

bpsteps.cmd: Purge (Permanently delete) one or more templates.
choices: To purge a single template, hover over the template to purge, and click/tap the Delete icon for that item.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Templates-Delete-icon-E91.png|Delete icon for each item in the list.
To purge multiple templates, check the boxes for the items to purge, and click/tap the Delete button.
img=scr-RecycleBin-Templates-Select-Then-Delete-button-E91.png|Delete button.
